title: STK operates locations in multiple countries
statement: STK Steakhouse has restaurant locations across the United States, Canada, Mexico, Qatar, UAE, and Europe including England and Italy.

citations.quote: Locations listed include: Arizona, California, Colorado, D.C., Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Mexico, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Puerto Rico, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Washington, Ontario, Qatar, United Arab Emirates, England, Italy
